servicesDes: Some of the services we provide
reviewsDes: what parents say about our service
reviewsDes1: I would like to express my sincere thanks to the wonderful babysitter who provided an exceptional service to my child. I felt reassured and comfortable leaving my baby in her hands, and this is priceless. It was a great experience for us and our baby.
reviewsDes2: she is not just someone who watches over them while we are not around, she is an important educational and caring partner who plays a vital role in their growth and development. Therefore, we should choose the babysitter carefully.
findJopTitle2: you can find your dream job.
findJopDes: If you want to get a job as a babysitter or any other housework, you can apply for the job with us and fill in the personal data below
applyIdDes: upload an official government ID , your personal id will never be shared with anyone
applyaddressDes: upload any utility bills(electricity,water,gas),that show our name and current address. bill should be recent within the last three months
applySelfieDes: take a selfie with your id just to match it with your id photo make sure you are in good light
